articles.title: Beyoncé Almost Suffers Wardrobe Malfunction, Backup Dancer Saves Her - TMZ
articles.description: Beyoncé almost had a nip-slip situation on her hands in Europe this week, but disaster was averted.
articles.content:
Beyoncé nearly fell out of her top earlier this week during a live show in Germany -- but one of her backup dancers saw the issue before it became a disaster ... and played the hero.

articles.title: Macron calls for an international taxation deal to finance climate efforts - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president wants an international effort to raise money to tackle climate change.
articles.content:
PARIS French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday hinted at a fresh push to revamp the international taxation system to finance climate efforts.
